title: Kevin Jonas gets a tattoo of his wife Danielle from his Sucker music video
text:
Kevin Jonas has added another tattoo to his varied collection.

This one is of his wife Danielle wearing a dress in what looks to be an artist's sketch. The inking is on the inside of his right arm.

The artist was revealed to be Los Angeles-based tattoo designer Winter Stone who has also inked up Kevin's brother Joe as well as Joe's wife Sophie Turner of Game Of Thrones fame.

Inky: Kevin Jonas has added another tattoo to his varied collection. This one is of his wife Danielle wearing a dress in what looks to be an artist's sketch. The inking is on the inside of his right arm

Video star: The tattoo was inspired by a photo of Danielle in a light pink tulle dress as she walked six Corgies during his Sucker music video for the Jonas brothers

'Brand new addition to the fam. So proud of this time in our life and getting to remember this with @daniellejonas forever!' Kevin wrote on his Instagram caption to his 4.9M followers

Danielle has on a tiered long dress that looks like a costume from the set of Gone With The Wind.

Her hair is pinned up and slightly blowing. There are no facial features.

So in love on her birthday : The pair seen at TAO Chicago in September

Family of four: The couple married in December 2009 and share daughters Alena Rose, five, and Valentina Angelina, two

The tattoo was inspired by a photo of Danielle in a light pink tulle dress as she walked six Corgies during his Sucker music video for the Jonas brothers.

Also in the video were Sophie, who is wed to Joe, and Priyanka Chopra, who calls Nick Jonas her husband.

It's next to a tattoo of an ornate key.

The band is back: The three brothers, Nick, Kevin and Joe, perform on stage at Rogers Arena on October 11 in Vancouver

The couple married in December 2009 and share daughters Alena Rose, five, and Valentina Angelina, two.

They in May 2007 met while on holiday with their families in the Bahamas in May 2007.

Stone makes 'perfectly precise fine line single needle' tattoos, according to a press release. The tattoo designer shared, 'Wear it with pride.'

His work has also appeared on Lady Gaga, John Legend, Mandy Moore, Matt Damon, Demi Lovato, Miley Cyrus and Emma Roberts and many more.
description: This one is of his wife Danielle wearing a dress in what looks to be an artist's sketch. The inking is on the inside of his right arm. The artist was revealed to be tattoo designer Winter Stone.
